Chính Sách Bảo Mật Thông Tin Cá Nhân nà: This Personal Information Privacy Policy includes the following:
Thông tin cá nhân của khách hàng sẽ được: Personal information of customers will be stored until the customers request to cancel or log in and cancel themselves. In any case, customers' personal information will be secured on the servers of Book Store.

Bảo đảm an toàn trong môi trường vận hà: Ensuring safety in the operating environment: We store customers' non-personal information in a secure operating environment, and only employees, representatives, and service providers can access it as needed. We comply with industry standards and laws in protecting customers' personal information.
Trong trường hợp máy chủ lưu trữ thông: In the event that the server storing information is hacked, resulting in the loss of customers' personal data, we will be responsible for notifying the relevant authorities to investigate and handle the situation promptly, and informing the customers.
